description.raw:
prerelease 0.5.0~pre1 builds failed:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-common-debbuilder/35/

~~~
-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling.
-- 	Missing: libavdevice
--  END BUILD ERRORS

CMake Error at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnConfigureBuild.cmake:64 (message):
  Errors encountered in build.  Please see BUILD ERRORS above.
~~~

With this branch, it gets farther, though it is still having a weird test failure in `UNIT_Console_TEST`:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-common-debbuilder/41

~~~
71/71 Test #11: UNIT_Console_TEST .......................***Timeout 240.00 sec
[==========] Running 17 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 17 tests from Console_TEST
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.NoInitAndLog
[       OK ] Console_TEST.NoInitAndLog (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.InitAndLog
[       OK ] Console_TEST.InitAndLog (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.LogSlashN
[       OK ] Console_TEST.LogSlashN (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.LogStdEndl
[       OK ] Console_TEST.LogStdEndl (1 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnSlashN
[       OK ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnSlashN (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnStdEndl
[       OK ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnStdEndl (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorDbgSlashN
[       OK ] Console_TEST.ColorDbgSlashN (1 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorDbgStdEndl
[       OK ] Console_TEST.ColorDbgStdEndl (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorMsgSlashN
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ign-common-debbuilder/build/ignition-common-0.5.0~pre1/src/Console_TEST.cc:40: Failure
Value of: ignition::common::removeAll(absPath)
  Actual: false
Expected: true
[  FAILED  ] Console_TEST.ColorMsgSlashN (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorMsgStdEndl
Error opening log file: /root/tmp-ign//0b39c067-0c58-4e3a-925e-9f6c9ca1157c/test.log


99% tests passed, 1 tests failed out of 71

Total Test time (real) = 240.08 sec
~~~

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-common-debbuilder/42

~~~
71/71 Test #11: UNIT_Console_TEST .......................***Timeout 240.00 sec
[==========] Running 17 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 17 tests from Console_TEST
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.NoInitAndLog
[       OK ] Console_TEST.NoInitAndLog (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.InitAndLog
[       OK ] Console_TEST.InitAndLog (1 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.LogSlashN
[       OK ] Console_TEST.LogSlashN (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.LogStdEndl
[       OK ] Console_TEST.LogStdEndl (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnSlashN
[       OK ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnSlashN (1 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnStdEndl
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ign-common-debbuilder/build/ignition-common-0.5.0~pre1/src/Console_TEST.cc:40: Failure
Value of: ignition::common::removeAll(absPath)
  Actual: false
Expected: true
[  FAILED  ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnStdEndl (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorDbgSlashN


99% tests passed, 1 tests failed out of 71

Total Test time (real) = 240.09 sec
~~~
description.html:
prerelease 0.5.0~pre1 builds failed:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-common-debbuilder/35/
-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling.
--  Missing: libavdevice
--  END BUILD ERRORS

CMake Error at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnConfigureBuild.cmake:64 (message):
  Errors encountered in build.  Please see BUILD ERRORS above.

With this branch, it gets farther, though it is still having a weird test failure in UNIT_Console_TEST:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-common-debbuilder/41
71/71 Test #11: UNIT_Console_TEST .......................***Timeout 240.00 sec
[==========] Running 17 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 17 tests from Console_TEST
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.NoInitAndLog
[       OK ] Console_TEST.NoInitAndLog (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.InitAndLog
[       OK ] Console_TEST.InitAndLog (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.LogSlashN
[       OK ] Console_TEST.LogSlashN (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.LogStdEndl
[       OK ] Console_TEST.LogStdEndl (1 ms)

[       OK ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnSlashN (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnStdEndl
[       OK ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnStdEndl (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorDbgSlashN
[       OK ] Console_TEST.ColorDbgSlashN (1 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorDbgStdEndl
[       OK ] Console_TEST.ColorDbgStdEndl (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorMsgSlashN
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ign-common-debbuilder/build/ignition-common-0.5.0~pre1/src/Console_TEST.cc:40: Failure
Value of: ignition::common::removeAll(absPath)
  Actual: false
Expected: true
[  FAILED  ] Console_TEST.ColorMsgSlashN (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorMsgStdEndl
Error opening log file: /root/tmp-ign//0b39c067-0c58-4e3a-925e-9f6c9ca1157c/test.log


99% tests passed, 1 tests failed out of 71

Total Test time (real) = 240.08 sec
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-common-debbuilder/42
71/71 Test #11: UNIT_Console_TEST .......................***Timeout 240.00 sec
[==========] Running 17 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 17 tests from Console_TEST
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.NoInitAndLog
[       OK ] Console_TEST.NoInitAndLog (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.InitAndLog
[       OK ] Console_TEST.InitAndLog (1 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.LogSlashN
[       OK ] Console_TEST.LogSlashN (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.LogStdEndl

/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ign-common-debbuilder/build/ignition-common-0.5.0~pre1/src/Console_TEST.cc:40: Failure
Value of: ignition::common::removeAll(absPath)
  Actual: false
Expected: true
[  FAILED  ] Console_TEST.ColorWarnStdEndl (0 ms)
[ RUN      ] Console_TEST.ColorDbgSlashN


99% tests passed, 1 tests failed out of 71

Total Test time (real) = 240.09 sec

title.raw: require libavdevice as well to build

description:
prerelease 0.5.0~pre1 builds failed:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-common-debbuilder/35/

~~~
-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling.
-- 	Missing: libavdevice
--  END BUILD ERRORS

CMake Error at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnConfigureBuild.cmake:64 (message):
  Errors encountered in build.  Please see BUILD ERRORS above.
~~~

With this branch, it gets farther, though it is still having a weird test failure in `UNIT_Console_TEST`:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-common-debbuilder/41
